column4: Hello everyone! i just installed ubuntu and i am unable to connect to internet. my netwoek card is Realtek 129 Fast Ethernet Adapter. Can someone help me get the internet working please?
yes gogeta1
i have done that already
lspci and ifconfig -a paste results in
pastebin
gogeta1 may be right, if you do not have a router after cable modem.
some cable providers require to call in new MAC address as well.
u have stuf from ipconfig -a and lspci?
from ifconfig -a is there an eth0?
lo is loopback,
from term, type sudo dhclient
it says network is down
bad cable, or check ur connections
is there a light on the eth card? is the port light o nthe router on?
ok, do an ifconfig -a eth0 on that one.
same thing as before, no inet info there but have ethernet hardware ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff
so you are on a computer with no IP address but on the internet.
srry i have no internet access on that one .. this one that i am using is windows
that was my last question
give IP address, and is DHCP Enabled = yes or no.
have a look at that paste
